about_the_game:
Story


Once upon a time, there was a planet called Meow Meow, where the inhabitants, the Meow Meows, loved to play a game called Monopoly. However, a witch named Lele always rolled a one on the dice, so she always lost. Anger, resentment, jealousy, and a powerful obsession caused the space to warp, and the demonic energy from another time and space also corrupted Lele and the other little animals. Lele also used her newly learned magic to create a chessboard world where it was easier to win when rolling a one. The other Meow Meows in the village were also sealed in the chessboard world by her, and the players will play various Meow Meows to compete with Lele, ultimately helping the Meow Meows to escape this absurd chessboard world...

Game Features


A Game of Luck and Strategy



●The majority of the map's plots can be freely constructed, and stacking similar plots can upgrade the plot level. Upgrading plots enhances difficulty and rewards, and by balancing the benefits with the number of enemies, you can control the risks and gains.



●Plots can interact with each other, whether it's enhancing steel plots or combat monster plots. Try to connect similar types of plots to maximize the benefits, but don't be too greedy!



●A journey of dice filled with both luck and strategy, where neither can be absent. Is it a cautious advance with steady progress, or a risky venture to let the snowball grow bigger and bigger?

Single-use items







●A variety of consumables can give you an edge in battle: a clock that freezes time, a flash to break through encirclement, a potion that refills your health, or even a bomb that wipes out all enemies at once. These are not only powerful tools for turning the tide in desperate situations but also financial products that generate one-time profits. Use the money collected in battle to purchase a wide range of items.



●While engaging in battle, you can enhance your own attributes with a variety of attribute plots to choose from: attack, defense, speed, luck, and evasion. Upgrading these plots often won't directly bring you immediate benefits; you need to roll the dice to move forward and trigger their activation effects when you land on the corresponding plots. Higher levels mean stronger activation effects. It's best to upgrade these plots while also trying to land on them as often as possible.

A Thrilling Battle Experience





●Dozens of weapons are at your disposal, ranging from long-range missiles and lasers that can obliterate enemies from afar, to protective barriers and guardian stars that prevent foes from approaching. With a combination of over ten types of weapons and characters, you can choose the ones that best suit your preferences and fighting style. Every attack, every dodge, every summoning spell, brings you an unprecedented sense of exhilaration in combat.

name: Feline Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 或 AMD 同等配置
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K 或 AMD 同等配置
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 或 AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam 或 Intel Arc A380
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Feline Survivor is a rogue-lite game that combines classic Monopoly and Backgammon.You'll travels different planets, defeat countless monsters, and build the perfect map loop and weapon combos in this game of luck and tactics, until you finally find the secret treasure guarded by the monsters.
